title: What is the difference between PMS (power management system) and EMS (energy management system)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Power Management System monitors and controls the power so that the power load does not crosses the defined threshold… while Energy Management System efficiently uses all the energy resources and monitor their consumption. iBEMS, a new age intelligent building and energy management solution allows you to do both Power Management and Energy Management at the same time.

In some senses they could be considered the same. In common (but not formally defined) terminology a power management system manages power supplies. A energy management system manages power consumption
